name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Full Stack Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **TypeScript**, **JavaScript**, and **Node.js**, with extensive expertise in developing and deploying **serverless** applications on **AWS** using tools like **API Gateway**, **S3**, **EventBridge**, and **RDS**. Skilled in implementing event-driven architectures and designing microservices with a strong focus on scalability and efficiency.

Experienced in integrating **AI** solutions, including **LLM** technologies, for predictive analytics and automation, coupled with a robust background in compliant-driven development aligned with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept in using **Terraform** and **CloudFormation** for infrastructure as code, as well as orchestrating deployment pipelines for continuous integration and delivery. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, combined with hands-on experience in monitoring and testing applications to ensure reliability and performance.

Leveraged **AWS services** such as **S3**, **RDS**, and **DynamoDB** to enhance data accessibility and optimize backend processes for real-time analytics.
Integrated serverless architectures using **AWS Lambda**, **API Gateway**, and **EventBridge** for efficient event-driven functionalities and reduced operational overhead.
Created CI/CD pipelines employing modern tools like **Terraform** and **AWS CDK**, ensuring automated deployment processes and infrastructure as code principles with versioning for better visibility.
Implemented robust and scalable data storage solutions using **PostgreSQL** and **NoSQL** databases, adhering to best practices for data integrity and performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop intelligent features such as AI-driven predictive health alerts, utilizing **Langfuse** and prompt engineering to enhance user experience.
Defined comprehensive testing strategies using tools like **Jest** and **Cypress** to ensure code quality and optimal functionality across the application stack.
Monitored application performance and operational health using sophisticated monitoring strategies to ensure high availability and swift identification of anomalies.
Led the deployment of machine learning models for enhanced risk assessment through integration with **AWS** and **monitoring frameworks** ensuring seamless transition from development to production environments.
Developed and maintained detailed documentation of architectures and workflows, emphasizing transparency and team collaboration, while adhering to version control best practices.

Utilized **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django) to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.

Developed robust serverless applications using **AWS** technologies, such as **API Gateway**, **S3**, **DynamoDB**, and **RDS**, to optimize resource management and reduce operational costs by **30%**.

Built dynamic front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, implementing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** for responsive design that improved user engagement by **25%**.

Delivered real-time analytics dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with immediate insights into transactions and anomalies, leading to a **40%** increase in operational efficiency.

Designed and deployed an event-driven architecture leveraging **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring efficient asynchronous communication across essential workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance, resulting in processing improvements of **50%**.

Developed ETL pipelines utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for ingesting financial data from both internal and third-party sources, capable of handling **1M+** transactions per day with support for batch and real-time processing.

Deployed machine learning models for fraud detection employing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity, improving fraud detection rates by **20%** based on user behavior and transaction patterns.

Created ML pipelines focused on real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, using **MLflow** and **Airflow** to seamlessly integrate model inference into backend services.

Utilized **AWS** services such as **S3**, **RDS**, and **DynamoDB** to architect and manage scalable backend infrastructure for high-performance web applications, achieving up to **99.9%** uptime and improving response times by **30%**.
Engineered and deployed **Serverless** architectures and **API Gateway** integrations, streamlining microservices and enhancing application performance while reducing costs by approximately **25%**.
Developed robust applications using **Node.js** (including **TypeScript**), ensuring maintainability and scalability of code with over **90%** test coverage through automated testing frameworks.
Implemented real-time features and event-driven workflows using AWS **EventBridge**, maintaining system responsiveness and reliability across services.
Designed, built, and executed CI/CD pipelines using **Terraform** and **AWS CDK**, improving deployment speed and reducing the average time to market for new features by **40%**.
Engaged in prompt engineering strategies for optimizing interactions with **LLM** applications to enhance user engagement and analytics accuracy.
Administered databases like **PostgreSQL** and **NoSQL** databases for effective data persistence, enabling efficient query performance with over **1 million** transactions processed monthly.
Conducted extensive monitoring and testing to ensure system integrity and performance, employing tools and practices aligned with best industry standards.
Spearheaded efforts in implementing secure access protocols utilizing **IAM** roles and **OAuth 2.0**, reinforcing platform security and compliance with regulations such as GDPR.
Collaborated on deploying features using container orchestration tools, significantly improving application scalability and allowing seamless feature rollouts.
